title: Any possibility of getting my 20 minute taken away?
body: I was recently in a ranked match. I started out the game and it was working fine. At about twelve minutes I started experiencing frame drop which is very uncommon on my computer (its a mac). I told my teammates I had like 30 fps. At about 15 minutes I decided I couldn't do this any longer so I decided I would just quickly relog and told my team I would do so. When I tried to exit out of the game, the screen froze and I eventually had to restart my computer. After getting back into the game after about 5-7 minutes I continued on playing normally. The game ended at about 30 minutes. When I exited about of the game I was told that since I had afked I would receive a 5 game 20 minute wait. Obviously, I was pretty pissed. I was just wondering if there was anyway I could get this taken away? I just finished up with another 5 games of 20 minute waits about a week ago. Ive never rage quit in my life and Ive never left for no reason. I highly doubt riot will do anything about this and Ill just end up playing them off but I hope that maybe just maybe theres something riot can do.

replies.body:
We can't remove [lower priority queues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), and they would only apply to an account after multiple leaves.  What I would like to do is help get this resolved so you can stay in game!  Did you recently update Windows 10?  There's been an issue where some players having been freezing due to an issue with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) game bar.  Disabling that should help a ton.

If you still end up with fps issues, there could be other problems such as with your drivers.  To rule out possibilities, go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
